subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Avalanches
Bicycles and Bicycling
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Mauro Santambrogio of Italy won the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia on a course that was changed because of avalanche threats. His countryman Vincenzo Nibali extended his overall lead.
snippet: Mauro Santambrogio of Italy won the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia on a course that was changed because of avalanche threats. His countryman Vincenzo Nibali extended his overall lead.
